body:
**Is this a BUG REPORT or FEATURE REQUEST?**:

/kind bug

**What happened**:
The pods are stuck in `CrashLoopBackOff` with this error:

```
failed to open log file "/var/log/pods/3f68b784-7e57-11e7-979c-42010af000e6/hivemp-elasticsearch-nodeconfig_15.log": open /var/log/pods/3f68b784-7e57-11e7-979c-42010af000e6/hivemp-elasticsearch-nodeconfig_15.log: no such file or directory
```

**What you expected to happen**:
I expect the pods to start.

**How to reproduce it (as minimally and precisely as possible)**:
Running this daemon set on a GCE cluster on `1.7.3` (both master and nodes):
```
# Please edit the object below. Lines beginning with a '#' will be ignored,
# and an empty file will abort the edit. If an error occurs while saving this file will be
# reopened with the relevant failures.
#
apiVersion: extensions/v1beta1
kind: DaemonSet
metadata:
  annotations:
    kubectl.kubernetes.io/last-applied-configuration: |
      {"apiVersion":"extensions/v1beta1","kind":"DaemonSet","metadata":{"annotations":{},"labels":{"component":"hivemp-elasticsearch","role":"nodeconfig"},"name":"hivemp-elasticsearch-nodeconfig","namespace":"default"},"spec":{"template":{"metadata":{"labels":{"name":"hivemp-elasticsearch-nodeconfig"}},"spec":{"containers":[{"command":["bash","-c","sysctl -w vm.max_map_count=262144 \u0026\u0026 (while [ 0 -eq 0 ]; do sleep 10; done)"],"image":"busybox","imagePullPolicy":"IfNotPresent","name":"hivemp-elasticsearch-nodeconfig","resources":{"requests":{"cpu":"0m"}},"securityContext":{"privileged":true}}]}}}}
  creationTimestamp: 2017-08-11T05:38:04Z
  generation: 1
  labels:
    component: hivemp-elasticsearch
    role: nodeconfig
  name: hivemp-elasticsearch-nodeconfig
  namespace: default
  resourceVersion: "26048395"
  selfLink: /apis/extensions/v1beta1/namespaces/default/daemonsets/hivemp-elasticsearch-nodeconfig
  uid: 3f65f984-7e57-11e7-979c-42010af000e6
spec:
  revisionHistoryLimit: 10
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      name: hivemp-elasticsearch-nodeconfig
  template:
    metadata:
      creationTimestamp: null
      labels:
        name: hivemp-elasticsearch-nodeconfig
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - bash
        - -c
        - sysctl -w vm.max_map_count=262144 && (while [ 0 -eq 0 ]; do sleep 10; done)
        image: busybox
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: hivemp-elasticsearch-nodeconfig
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: "0"
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        terminationMessagePath: /dev/termination-log
        terminationMessagePolicy: File
      dnsPolicy: ClusterFirst
      restartPolicy: Always
      schedulerName: default-scheduler
      securityContext: {}
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 30
  templateGeneration: 1
  updateStrategy:
    type: OnDelete
status:
  currentNumberScheduled: 3
  desiredNumberScheduled: 3
  numberMisscheduled: 0
  numberReady: 0
  numberUnavailable: 3
  observedGeneration: 1
  updatedNumberScheduled: 3
```

**Anything else we need to know?**:
-

**Environment**:
- Kubernetes version (use `kubectl version`): `Client Version: version.Info{Major:"1", Minor:"7", GitVersion:"v1.7.2", GitCommit:"922a86cfcd65915a9b2f69f3f193b8907d741d9c", GitTreeState:"clean", BuildDate:"2017-07-21T08:23:22Z", GoVersion:"go1.8.3", Compiler:"gc", Platform:"windows/amd64"}
Server Version: version.Info{Major:"1", Minor:"7", GitVersion:"v1.7.3", GitCommit:"2c2fe6e8278a5db2d15a013987b53968c743f2a1", GitTreeState:"clean", BuildDate:"2017-08-03T06:43:48Z", GoVersion:"go1.8.3", Compiler:"gc", Platform:"linux/amd64"}`
- Cloud provider or hardware configuration**: Google Container Engine
- OS (e.g. from /etc/os-release): N/A
- Kernel (e.g. `uname -a`): N/A
- Install tools: N/A
- Others: N/A

title: "failed to open log file" on privileged daemon set
